name: Rocky Balboa
quote: You, me, or nobody is gonna hit as hard as life. But it ain't about how hard you hit. It's about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.

name: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: If you cant't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.

name: Unknown
quote: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you. Failure builds character.

name: Robert Schuller
quote: Tough times don't last; tough people do.

name: Maya Angelou
quote: We may encounter defeats, but we must not be defeated.

name: Confucius
quote: Those who think they can and those who think they can't are both usually right.

name: Zig Ziglar
quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start be great.

name: Wayne Gretzky
quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

name: Jesse Owens
quote: The battles that count aren't the ones for gold medals. The struggles within yourself--the invisible battles inside all of us--that's where it's at.

name: George Eliot
quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
